title: Define the system architecture
description: Develop a high-level design for the neural interface system that considers hardware, software, and connectivity requirements.

title: Design the brainwave sensor hardware
description: Create a design for the brainwave sensors that will be used to collect data from players.

title: Develop the brainwave sensor software
description: Write software that can process and interpret brainwave data collected by the sensors.

title: Create a user interface for players
description: Develop an intuitive and accessible interface that allows players to easily connect their brainwave sensors and start playing.

title: Integrate brainwave control into game engines
description: Modify popular game engines to support controlling games with brainwaves.
dependencies: Create a user interface for players

title: Test the neural interface system
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the neural interface system to ensure it is functioning correctly and safely.
dependencies: Create a user interface for players
Integrate brainwave control into game engines
